tasks.instruction:
Enhance the existing Hybrid Sentiment Analysis System dashboard with a modern, professional SaaS UI inspired by Grafana and Datadog. The current dashboard images are located at /workspace/uploads/Screenshot 2025-08-28 at 3.23.07 PM.png, /workspace/uploads/Screenshot 2025-08-28 at 3.23.15 PM.png, and /workspace/uploads/Screenshot 2025-08-28 at 3.23.23 PM.png. 

Requirements:
1. Create a modern, professional SaaS dashboard UI with data-driven, minimalistic style
2. Implement dual login system with separate interfaces for:
   - Client login (for viewing their sentiment analysis data)
   - Admin login (for managing the system and viewing all data)
3. Enhance the existing features shown in the screenshots:
   - Dashboard with sentiment metrics (200 across all platforms)
   - Sentiment trends over time chart
   - Sentiment distribution pie chart
   - Platform comparison bar chart
   - High urgency complaints section
   - Feedback explorer with filtering capabilities
4. Use Shadcn-ui, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
5. Ensure responsive design and modern UI patterns similar to Grafana/Datadog
6. Include proper authentication flow and role-based access control
7. Maintain the existing functionality while significantly improving the visual design and user experience
